page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT (CONTD)
page.content: Workers travel to Chipping warden, Byfield,Woodford Halse,Cropredy,Edgcote ,Leamington Spa,Daventry,Northampton, Coventry,Towcester,a USAF airman to Upper Heyford,an airline pilot to luton airport one man daily to Greenford,Mid- dlesex.Only 9 men living in Aston actualy work on farms as farmers,farm workers or agnz. contractors.One man earns part of his living from his man- hold. HEALTH. Medical centres at Byfield, 3 doctors, Cropredy 2 doctors. Local hospital Horton General, Banbury. GOVERNMENT. Aston has a parish meeting not council, less than 200 voters; chairman deals with daily business of civil parish, amalgamated with Appletree CP early 1900s. LAW & ORDER. The police constable lives in the Police House, Culworth. Magistrate's Court at Brackley.
